price: (225) Do you not see that in every valley they roam[1068]
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ
footnotes: [1068]- Speaking lies indiscriminately and praising and disparaging others according to whim.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
